metadata.description: In India's city that never sleeps, Mumbai, there are things that exist in the shadows that ordinary people know nothing of: another world that lies underneath our very own; a world of demons, monsters, djinns, mummies, werewolves, vampires and demi-gods. It's in this world that Paranormal Investigator Darius Mistry, P.I. and his 'golem of Prague' buddy Amos operate as Paranormal Investigators for hire.
metadata.name: Mistry, P.I.
